# init(model:)

**Initializer**

Creates a model container to use with an image analysis request based on the model you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(model: VNCoreMLModel)
```

## Parameters

- **model**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML] model on which to base the Vision request.

## Discussion

Initialization can fail if the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML] model you provide isn’t supported in Vision, such as if the model doesn’t accept an image as input.

## Initializing with a Core ML Model

- **init(model:completionHandler:)**: Creates a model container to use with an image analysis request based on the model you provide, with an optional completion handler.
- **model**: The model to base the image analysis request on.
- **VNCoreMLModel**: A container for the model to use with Vision requests.
